title: Äventyrsgolf
description:
Bunkers, greens, water hazards and ruffles. You play our adventure wave in the company of friends or colleagues at the conference. Beginners or professionals, in the midst of our archipelago environment at Marholmen, you can activate and strengthen the ties by taking you through the 12-hole course. On the Adventure Golf it is your individual result counting, but you play in a company of four. Those who get the best results from the round meet up in a three-stage puzzle competition; quarter final, semifinal and final. Perfect activity for the family!

Price: Adults 80 SEK Children and senior citizens 60 SEK in VAT

Groups

For the larger groups, we recommend the tournament where you can compete in an organized tournament with at least one judge in place that will explain the rules of the game. Once all the teams have gone through the twelve courses, the scorecards are collected and counted by the referee who then holds a prize giving.

Price: 360 kr / per ink VAT (288 kr / per ex.moms) Min. deb.10 pers.
